channel.title: XN - Downfall (Electronic/Dance)
channel.description:
"Another one" - dj khaled
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2LTCp6bOF80
https://soundcloud.com/xn-extras/downfall-1
a bit more of a traditional track than my last post. Also, not sure why, but i really like how I did the buildups for this track. They're nothing special or new, but i just really liked how they turned out (granted prob could have been better with something other than the demo drums, but still)
